category: Herbs that Dispel Wind-Damp and Relieve Pain

action.primary: Dispels Wind-Damp opens the channels and collaterals and relieves pain

indications: Kidney stones, gall stones and pancreatitis

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, Removes Blood Stasis

indications: Traumatic injury with pain and swelling, including fractures

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with hemorrhagic disorders.

useCases: Fried and applied topically for Bi syndrome

notes: Grind into a paste and apply topically for fractures.
